title: (x) Beautiful italic sans on J Kaczmarek website - Omnes {Stephen}
content:
Man am I ever happy I stumbled upon this board.

Does anyone know what font is being used on [http://www.jkaczmarek.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211110847/http:/www.jkaczmarek.com/ "http://www.jkaczmarek.com/")

The one that says “design & art direction”??

Any help would be appreciated!!

 [‹ I can't find this typeface... please help](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211110847/http:/typophile.com/node/41793 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can you help me ID this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211110847/http:/typophile.com/node/41798 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kydee

comments.content: As you knew what you were looking for, maybe next time do a [Search](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211110847/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20www.jkaczmarek.com). It would’ve turned up [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211110847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40871). Search is your friend. ;^)

My mistake - sorry.

Does anyone know the other font used on his site?? The font used for work/about/inquire??
lol - thanks - probably should have checked that!!

\> _My mistake - sorry._

Hey, no need to be sorry — I was just pointing it out. Now you know. :^)

Welcome to Typophile BTW.
